sect1.title: Attachments
sect1.para: Files can be attached to an e-mail using the createAttachment() method. The default behavior of Zend_Mail is to assume the attachment is a binary object (application/octet-stream), that it should be transferred with base64 encoding, and that it is handled as an attachment. These assumptions can be overridden by passing more parameters to createAttachment():

example.title: E-Mail Messages with Attachments
